name: Light & Motion Vya Combo Bike Light Set
description: This duo is compact, easy to charge, weatherproof, and they turn themselves on and off.  This taillight and headlight bundle are ready for low-light commutes. Thanks to a little internal magic, they know when you are on the move and automatically turning on and off.Internal motion detector turns lights on when you start rolling.Lights cannot turn on unless in the mount and turn off when removed from the mount.Headlight  runs up to 10h at 150 lumens.Taillight  runs  up to 8h at 50 lumens.Pulsing light pattern is engineered for maximum visibility.Both lights have an integrated type-A male USB plug.Side lighting ports add visibilty for traffic approaching from either side.IP67 weather proofing.
